short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A developer tool for inspecting and debugging Stimulus applications.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Stimulus DevTools Chrome Extension is an open-source tool designed to simplify the process of debugging Stimulus on a web page. It provides a user-friendly interface for inspecting values, targets, outlets, and classes of Stimulus controllers, all directly from Chrome's DevTools.

Usage :
- Open the Chrome devtools on your page
- Go to the Stimulus tab
